item.title: BORT a Virtual Assistant - BOT
item.description: “BORT”is a structure of recognizing intentions for a Virtual Assistant.It combines the Neural Network BERT of Google and Naive Bayes Algorithms with CountVectorizer to understand the intention of the user. In collaboration with: Adri치n Cox Garz칩n Tom치s Gonz치lez GitHub Repository Virtual Assistant vs. Chatbot A chatbot is a simple bot who has commands to activate responses or functions. Our idea was to set a bot that can be integrated in a fluid conversational chat.
